column2: sunipuṇaṃ nirūpayanto 'pi māṃsacakṣuṣā vayaṃ tāvan nāparam atra vastujātam īkṣāmahe, yad abhāva-śrutyā viṣayīkriyate | taddarśanābhāvāc ca tat-kāraṇam api kim avadhārayāmo, yad abhāvena pūrva-pūrvam asan nāśa iti syāt? yaś ca tat-kāraṇaṃ kalpito daṇḍas tasyāpy anvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinī kapāla-paṅktir eva dṛṣṭā, nānyā kācit | vaidharmya-dṛṣṭāntatayeyam upanyastā punaḥ, yatheyam adhyakṣānupalambhābhyām anvayavyatirekāv anubidadhatī dṛśyatayā

column2: ayam arthaḥ | yathā vegavan mudgara-prahārāt pūrvaṃ ghaṭasya nāśo nāstīti pratipādayituṃ śakyaṃ bhavatas tat-svabhāva-bhūtāyāḥ kapālapaṅkter adarśanāt, tathā nābhāva-paramparāparicayo 'pi nāstīti śakyam | na hy abhāve 'pi kapālapaṅktir evocyate, yena svabhāvānupalabdhir avalambanaṃ tad-vad eva syāt | atha nāśa-vad abhāvo 'pi kapālapaṅktir evocyate, tadā kvacid deśe kumbham ekam apanīya kumbhāntara-nyāse katham abhāva-vyavahāraḥ, kapālāvaler abhāvāt? asti ca kathañcid bhedam ākalayataḥ tatrāpy abhāva-vyavahāraḥ ekasyānyasya sādṛśya-vipralabdhasya prācīnāvasthāna-vyavasāye 'pi, tat kathaṃ kapāla-pālir evābhāvaḥ? tad asyāṃ dhvaṃsa-śabdaṃ saṃketayato yadi pūrvaṃ dhvaṃso nāstīti śakyam apy abhidhātuṃ, kapāla-daśā-virahāt, abhāvas tu nāstīti na śakyam, sadṛśāpara-saṃbhavena dur-upalakṣaṇāt | tasmāt prahārāt prāg-abhāve 'pi kumbhasya saṃbhāvyamāne siddham abhimatam asmākam | dṛśyānupalambhānavatāraṇaṃ nāma, ato na karparāṇāṃ dhvaṃsa-saṃjñayopayogaḥ | na cānyan mudgarānvaya-vyatirekānukāri dṛṣṭam iti vyavahāra-mātra-parāyaṇa eva nāśo na vastuto 'sti |

column2: pūrvārdhena naṣṭa-ghaṭa-buddher janma-sāmagrīm ādarśya paścārdhenādhikasya nāśa-nāmno nānvayo na vyatirekas tad-viveka-sāmagryās tūbhayam anukṛtaṃ bhaved iti darśitam | tatra nāśākhyaṃ na kiñcid iha sāmagryāṃ nimittam astīty anvayo nirastaḥ, na cāsyāṃ satyām api sāmagryāṃ kadācin na syād buddhir iti vyatirekāvalambanam apāstam | pūrvaṃ tarhi kasmān neyaṃ buddhir iti vyatireka-pratyayāśātanaṃ śeṣena | yadi purāpy eṣā sāmagrī syāt, niyatam iyaṃ bhavantī buddhir arthāntara-sāpekṣatāṃ sūcayet | na ceyaṃ sāmagrī purāpy asti, vikalakapālapaṅkteḥ parigha-pātādi-kāraṇābhāvenābhāvāt | tat kuto vyatireka-māram api | ukta-sāmagryās tu na vāsyām api syād eṣā na kadācid iti niṣedha-dvayenānvayaḥ | śeṣeṇa vyatirekaś ca vyaktaḥ | tad buddhy abhāva kāle sāmagryā evābhāva-pratipādanād asau sāmagry-abhāvo buddhy-abhāva-vyāpta ity arthaḥ | yas tu pratyakṣetara-sahakāri-sākalya-rūpatayā sarvaiva sāmagrī parokṣeti samarthyate viṣama-dṛṣṭiḥ tataś ca parokṣatayā tasyā nānvaya-vyatireka-niścaya ity ucyate, hanta hutavahendhanādi-sāmagrī-pratibandho 'pi dhūmāder astamita iti apravṛtti-nivṛttikaṃ jagat prasajyeta | tasmān nādṛṣṭābhupagame dṛṣṭa-sādhana-sāmarthya-pratirodhenety alaṃ vistareṇa | tad ayaṃ ghaṭa-āmarśavataḥ kapālānubhava eva naṣṭa-ghaṭāvasāya-sādhana iti siddham |

column2: kāla-bhedena pūrvāpara-kālayor nāśa-bhāvayor abhāvāt kena kaḥ syāt | kvacit pratītiviṣayīkriyate | na ca bhāve sthiti-dharmo dhvaṃsaḥ, kiṃ tu pradeśe | na cānyatra sthitaḥ anyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ, daṇḍa-vat | bhedād evam api syād iti cet | bhedetarhi sarvānya-rūpa-vivekena pratibhāsamānam eva viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ svānuraktapratīti-viṣayīkuryāt, na svarūpeṇāpratibhāsamānaṃ, daṇḍa-vad eva | anumāna-siddhenāpi daṇḍena daṇḍi-pratītir utpādād anekānta iti cet | na, sarvathā yasya na svarūpāvabhāsa ity abhiprāyāt | daṇḍasya punar anumāna-kāke 'pratibhāsane 'pi niścāyakābhimata-liṅgena saha saṃbandha-grahaṇa-kāle 'sty eva svarūpa-nirbhāsaḥ | tatas tad-anusmaraṇād anumāna-kāle 'pi tad-rūpānuraktāṃ buddhim ādadhīta daṇḍaḥ | na ca sarvathā adṛṣṭadaṇḍasya daṇḍo 'py anumāna-bhājanaṃ svarūpānuraktapratītihetur vā dṛṣṭa-pūravaḥ | evaṃ nāśanām apy arthaḥ kathaṃ tathā syāt, sarvathā adarśanād iti | na ca daṇḍānumānād bhinnā daṇḍipratītiḥ, daṇḍo 'tra daṇḍo 'sya daṇḍavān ayam iti cānarthāntaratvāt | na ceyaṃ liṅga-tyāge (44b) na bhavantī pratijñā-mātratayānumānaṃ bhavatum arhati, yan naṣṭa-pratītir api nāśa-nāmārtha-sādhakaṃ niścayam apekṣamāṇā kathaṃ svayam eva sādhanatvenābhidhīyeta | na cānya-liṅgam asti sarvathā adṛśyatayā tasmin kasyacit pratibandhāsiddheḥ | ata eva hi sarva buddhis tat-siddhaye śaraṇam āśrīyate | ato 'numāna-siddhenānekāntaḥ | anumānasyāpi viśeṣaṇa-svarūpa-nirbhāsa-nānantarīyakatvād apṛthak-siddheś cānumāna-viśeṣaṇa-pratītiyor iti,

column2: [110,19] svānuraktapratītinimittarvaṃ nirbhāsa-bhṅge bhavad-atiprasaṅga-bādhitaṃ pratibhāsa-vattayaiva vyāptam | na cāsiddhiḥ, idan-tayā darśayitum aśakyasya bāhya-vastunaḥ pratibhāsa-vyavahārābhāvāt, idan-tayā nirdeśanīye ca vivādābhāvāt | na hi daṇḍo 'pi daṇḍipratītyā sādhyā 'dhyakṣa-siddhatvāt | mūṭhaṃ prati vyavahāra-sādhane 'pi nedan-tayā nirdeśaḥ, viśeṣato locana-gocare |

column2: [110,24] atha sarvaṃ vastu svarūpeṇa pratibhāti, na pararūpeṇa, yathā bhāva eva nābhāva-rūpeṇa, evam abhāvo 'pi bhāva-rūpeṇāpratibhāsamāno 'pi svarūpeṇa pratibhāty eva | idan-tayā pratibhāsanaṃ nayana-viṣayasyāpi bhāvasyaiva | ato nedantayā pratibhāsābhāve 'py apratibhāsa eveti cet |

column2: [111,2] naiva pararūpeṇa pratibhāso mṛgyate, tasyābhāvaṃ prati siddhatvāt | svarūpaṃ punar asya kiṃ tat-pratibhātīti nibhālayanto na labhāmahe, idan-tayā nirdeśas tu bhāveṣvāty api na rājakīyo niyamaḥ | tad yadi bhāveṣv api keṣucid eva netra-pātreṣv idan-tayā nirdeśo na sarveṣv iti brūyāt, tadā ṭaṅka-vakādayo 'pi punaraḥ pratibhāsinaḥ evīdan-tayā paraṃ nirdeṣṭum aśakyā iti kim atra vaktavyam | tasmād yāvac cakṣur-gocara-cāri vastu tāvad idan-tayā nirdeśa-pratibhāsam eva, yat punar idantayā nirdeśa-virahitaṃ tad apratibhāsanam eva nayana-grāhyam iti nyāyaḥ |

column2: atha viśeṣa-buddhyaiva pratibhāso 'pi sādhyaḥ, yathā hi na daṇḍibuddhir daṇḍa-buddhim antareṇa tathā daṇḍapratibhāsam antareṇāpi, evaṃ naṣṭa-buddhir api viśeṣa-buddhitvān na nāśaṃ nāśa-pratibhāsam antareṇeti katham apratibhāsa-ghoṣam iti cet | bhavaty eva vikāro na punar etādṛśaḥ | sva-santāna-varti-pratibhāso 'smābhir apy anumānena pratipattavya iti ghaṭādi-pratibhāse 'py evam idānīm āyātam | tat kim ahaṃ paśyāmi kiñcid ity anumānam anāptavatā āpta-vacanenāpi pratyetavyam ity artham apratikurvāṇo 'pi vaidya kṛtārthaḥ syāt | antataḥ śapathenāpi nivṛttir ālambyeta | parokṣe hi viṣaye 'mīṣāṃ prakārāṇam avakāśaḥ, (45a) na jñāne | yat punar apaśyantam ātmanaṃ vedayamāna eva paśyasīti grāhyate vyaktam iyaṃ bhaṇṭa-vidyā paśyantam api vāhayati | yo 'py apaśyann api tad-vacanena paśyāmīti gṛhṇīta sa khalu paśor api paśuḥ | jñāna-parokṣatā-vāde 'pi hi,

column2: abhyupagamyāpi brūmaḥ | astu vā nāśo nāma, na punar asyāvaśyaṃ pratītam eva janakaṃ mudgarādīti śakyam, yathā naṣṭa-ghaṭa-buddher eva na pratītiḥ kapālānubhavo hetur iṣṭaḥ, tathā nāśasyāpi mudgarādi-parihāreṇa kāraṇam anyad evādṛṣṭaṃ kiñcit syāt, yato na purā kāraṇānupalabdhi-siddhiḥ | yathā adṛṣṭam eva nāśākhyaṃ vastu svīkāra-siddhaṃ naṣṭa-buddher nibandhabam, tathā nāśasyāpy adṛṣṭam eva kiñcit kāraṇaṃ na mudgarādīti kathaṃ tad abhāve niyamena nāśa-nivṛttiḥ | ayaṃ tu viśeṣo yathā mudgarasya kapāle kapālānubhavasya ca naṣṭa-buddhāv anvaya-vyatirekābhyāṃ sāmarthya-siddhas tathā na mudgarasya nāśe na nāśyasya naṣṭa-buddhāv iti, yadi paraṃ bhavaduparodhād ayam arthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ |

column2: [112,7] atha kapālānubhavāt kapāla-kalpanaiva syāt, na naṣṭa-ghaṭa-buddhir iti cet | tad etaj jīvato vyāgrasya daṃṣṭrotpāṭanam | kalasāmarśavataṛkapāla-valaya-vīkṣaṇād eva naṣṭa-ghaṭa-buddhir udayaḥ sākṣād anubhūyamāno 'palapyate iti, evaṃ tarhi sarvasyānvaya-vyatirekāvadhāritārthasyāpalāpaḥ prasaktaḥ | yadā punar anarthitvādinā ghaṭāmarśena śūnyatā puruṣasya,tadā kapālāvalokanāt kapāla-kalpanaiva jāyate sāmagrī-bhedasya bhedakatvāt | yadi punar bhavad abhiprāyānuvartino bhavatā bhaveyur na bhaved apy evam, tadāpi yadīcchasi kapālānubhavād eva naṣṭa-buddhir astv iti, tadā tathaiva syād iti na nāśaḥ prayojakaḥ | tad alaṃ sva-manīṣikā-saṃpratyayena karpara-darśanam eva tad-buddhinibandhanam | yadā tu kalasa-vimarśam apekṣate tathā saṃketa-smaraṇam api, tato nātiprasaṅgaḥ | na ca saṃketo 'pi nāśam upadarśya kartuṃ śakyaḥ, tasyādarśyatvād eva, kiṃ tu visabhāgotpatti-rūpaṃ vikāram upadarśyaṃ etādṛśāvasthāyāṃ naśyataḥ prayoga iti | etenābhāva-darśanam eva bhāvānupalambhaṃ saṃbhāvayanto nirastāḥ,

column2: [113,3] bhāva-hetoḥ sakāśād abhāvodaya-varṇanā bhāvena sādharyaṃ sa ced ity uktam | atra dhvaṃsād anyateti ko 'rthaḥ | kim eko bhāvas tena khaṇṭa-khaṇṭīkriyate | atha bhāvāntarotpādana-mātram asmāt | uta pracīna-nivartanaṃ ca bhāvāntarotpādanaṃ ca | yad vā pracīna-nirvartana-mātram | tatra, naikātmānam anekatāṃ gamayati dhvaṃso virodhāt tayor ekānekatayoḥ | nanu kāla-bhedenaikam apy anekaṃ bhavan na duṣyatīti cet, sva-bheda-virahe kālasya bhede 'pi kim |

column2: [115,1] atha sarva-sāmarthyopākhyā-viraheṇābhāva-vyavahārāt śaktir api sattvam anumanyate, sāpi sva-jñāna-janane 'bhyupagataiva, niḥ śaṅka-gamanādikaṃ ca tat-kāryam eva | svābhyupagataḥ sattva-samavāyaḥ sva-kāraṇa-samavāyo vā paraṃ nāsti | na ca sarveṇa bhāva-dharmeṇa sarvatra bhāve bhāvitavyam, nāpi sarva-bhāva-dharmābhāvena bhāvāntarasyāpi na bhāvatavyam | evaṃ sati sāmānya-viśeṣa-samavāyānām apy abhāva-prasaṅgaḥ | tebhyo 'py adhiko dhvaṃsasyotpattir evāparādhaḥ | vastu cāvaśyaṃ nāśo vasaty-arthakriyā asminn iti na bhāva iti kaṣṭo vatāyaṃ siddhānta-viṣama-grahaḥ | tasmād bhavato 'tra svātantryam | yadi bhaṇasi dhvaṃso 'pi bhāvaḥ syāt, mudgarādir api kumbhasyābhāvaḥ syāt |

column2: [115,9] na khalu mudgarādikaṃ bhāvam abhāvaṃ vā kaścid vyavaharatīti cet | nanu dhvaṃsam api yadi kenacid rūpeṇa jāyamānam upalabheta kaścid viśeṣato nitya-sthitaṃ kim abhāvaṃ vyavaharet | dṛśyante hi tanu-dhūmādayo vyavadhānānavadhānādinā anupalabdha-mūrtayaḥ punar upalabhyamānā bhāva-vyavahāra-bhājaḥ | tasmād bhāva-vyavahāra-hānir asādarśanād eva praty-ātmaṃ vedyate pratiyogi-darśana-svabhāvāt | tac cādarśanam anubhavābhyupagame bhāva eva, anupalabhyatve tu janmādi-kīrtanam ākāśa-citraṇam | svarūpa-janmanor upalambhe tu bhāva-vyavahāraḥ prasahyāyāta iti katham asyāpi virodhitvam | na ca mudgarādāv apy abhāvaśabdāpravṛttir eva, bhāvāntara-paryudāsena tat-siddheḥ | na cātiprasaṅgo, dhvaṃsa-vat | yayā hi pratyāsattyā dhavaṃsākhyam eva vastu ghaṭasya nivṛttir ucyate, tasyā na karpara-parighayor vighātaḥ | virodhitvam api tayor eva ramaṇīyam, aṇīyasāpy aṃśena darśanākhyena tayor utkarṣāt | yayoḥ satoḥ kumbhābhāva-vyavahāra itiy asyātiprasaṅga-saṅgamād bhṅga-nimittasya puṣṭatvāt | na ca bhāvo bhāvāntara-virodhī na bhavaty eva, katham anyathā gotvam agotvasya, dahanas tukinasya vā |

column2: na khalu alākṣaṇika-virodhasya sad vastu-bādhana-vyāpāraḥ, kiṃ tu sahānavasthānasyaiva, lākṣaṇikasya tu dharmayor eva vyavasthānāt | vyavasthita eva vastuni vastunā avastunā vā svarūpasaṃkaravyatikaraniṣedhaḥ | tato yathā nīlam-anīlaṃ na bhavati ubhayor anyonya-svabhāvatvāt, tathā kalasa-nāśayor api syāt | na ca tāvateṣṭa-siddhiḥ mudgara-sannidhi-mātra iva tasya tādavasthānapāyāt |

column2: na, bhāvābhāvayor hi bhavanābhavana-rūpatayā dharmayor eva paraspara-parihāraḥ, yato na bhāvādhyasitasyābhāvo 'bhāvādhiṣṭhitasya vā bhāvaḥ, yato vā kumbha-nabho 'mbhor uhāder naikatvam | virodha-mātraṃ tu na vāryate, kevalam ekena bhavatā bhavataḥ paribhave sati | tāvatā ca sahānavasthāna-vyāpāraḥ | tasmād dharmayor eva paraspara-parihāraḥ | nīlānīlayoḥ katham iti cet | nīlānīlayoḥ paraspara-parihāra iti naikatvam anayor ity evārthaḥ | tato dharma-virodha evānenāpi prakāreṇa prakāśyate | anyathā tuhina-hutabhujor iva nīlānīla-vāsasor api militayor anavasthiti-prasaṅgaḥ | tādātmyaṃ tu tadāpi nāsty eva |

column2: [116,17] deśo 'pi nīlānīlayor bhinna eveti cet | kāmaṃ bhinnaḥ, na tu vastunor virodhaḥ tāvatā deśa-bhedena kṛtārthaḥ | anyathā jala-jvalayor api tad-vad eva militayoḥ prabandha-sthitiḥ prasajyeta, sūkṣma-deśa-parihāreṇa virodhasya phalavattvāt | ata eva viruddhopalabdhau kalpitaika-bhāvaḥ sthūla eva deśo dharmī | evaṃ nīlam anīlatvena virudhyata ity api nīlam-anīlaṃ na bhavatīty evārthaḥ |

column2: [117,1] siddhenābhāvena dharmeṇāsann eva ghaṭo 'sann iti vyavahriyate, na tu sann eva nivartyate | sattā-nivartate tu sarvatra sahānavasthāna-vyāparaḥ | kathaṃ punar ghaṭasyābhāvo dharmaḥ | kasya punar asau dharmo 'stu | dharmatvena svī-kārāt dharmiṇo 'vaśyam ākṣepātkṣmātalasyaivāstu iti cet | tataḥ kiṃ bhūtalasyaivābhāvo(47a) vivakṣitaḥ |

column2: bhavatu bhūtalasyānivartakas tad-dharmo vā kevalam, yathā nīla-viruddhānīlatva-yukte bhūtale nīla-vastu-sthitir aviruddhā, tathā gaṭa-viruddhābhimatenābhāvena yukte 'pi ghaṭa-sthiter avirodhaḥ syāt, tato 'bhimāna-mātra-vyavasthita evaiṣāṃ nivartya-nivartaka-bhāvaḥ | tasmād bhūtale kalasasyābhāva iti bhūtalādhārasya ghaṭasya saṃbandhitvenābhāsayantī vikalpa-buddhir abhāvaṃ tad-dharmatvena vyavahārayatīti nyāyyam | adhyavasitāpekṣayā tu saṃvādetarau tad evaṃ paraspara-parihāra-viruddho dharmaḥ sva-viruddhasyāsata evāsattām-ātma-dharmiṇi vyavahārayati | na tu nivartayatīti dharmiṇo bheda-vyavahāra-hetur eva | tathā ca jalānalādiṣu sparśasyoṣṇetaratvaṃ dūre 'pi pratyanīkākāravattayā anyonyāpanayanam anapekṣya svarūpa-vimarśa-mātreṇa virodha-vyavahāra-gocarībhavati | sahānavasthānaṃ punar ekenānyasya, sattā-nivartana-darśanād eva vyavasthāpyate | tad yadi sahānavasthānam abhimato virodhaḥ, tadā sidhyatu bhāvasya sattopalambhayor nivṛttiḥ | kevalaṃ bhāvayor evāsau na bhāvābhāvayoḥ |

column2: atha hetu-sāmarthyāt katham abhūtvā āsituṃ śaknotīty avaśyaṃ bhāvyaṃ dhvaṃseneti cet | na, pramāṇa-bādhite 'rthe hetu-sāmarthya-kalpanānupapatter atiprasaṅgāt | yāvat khalu bhāvasya śvāsaḥ calati na tāvad abhāva-gandhaḥ | anyathā viruddhābhimatayoḥ dharmayor ekatra dharmiṇi kṣaṇam api saṃbhave kva parasparaparihāravirodhaḥ | tathā hi hetu-balād bhavatu nāma, sahabhāvas tu vastuny ekatra bhāvābhāvayor duṣ-pariharaḥ | sa hi bhāvaḥ pūrva-vyavasthito, na bhavana-prayāsa-khinno yan nivarteta | mudgarādeś ca dhvaṃsa eva vyāpāraḥ | ubhayatra vyāpāre 'pi kim aṅga dhvaṃsena | nāpi dhvaṃsenaiva nivartanīyaḥ, tasyodayāt pūrvam avyāpārāt | tato bhāvasya sthitir abhāvasyotpattir iti siddhaḥ sahabhāvaḥ, girer iva kāśariṇotpadyamānena |

column2: [118,20] paścāt tarhi barhi-ṣevendhana-dhvaṃsena nirākariṣyate tāvad iti cet | bhāvābhāvayoḥ bhāvābhāvayoḥ sahabhāva-prasaṅga-dūṣaṇād avibhyad-abhyasta-durnītir uttaraṃ kila vilapati | paścād vidhvaṃsena bhāvo nirākariṣyate na vā, bhāvābhāvayos tu sahabhāvaḥ prasakta ity eva pakṣa-kṣatir āyātā | kim apara-gaveṣaṇena | yadi ca vyavasthito bhāvas tena dhvaṃsena dhvaṃsanīyaḥ, tadā vyaktam ayaṃ sahānavasthāna-virodha-vyāpāra iti prakṛta-kṣatiḥ | paraspara-parihāra-virodho hi vicārayitum upakrāntaḥ | tataḥ prakaraṇa-vismaraṇād vyutthāpayaty adyāpi paraspara-parihāra-virodhābhimataḥ, tadā na vyavasthitāpanayana-vyāpāraḥ spraṣṭavya iti drāghīyāna-sahabhāvaḥ |

column2: vyāpāras tu yathā naiṣa sahānavasthānasya tathā paraspara-parihārasyāpīti niveditam etat | nāpi bhaviṣyataḥ kācic chaktiḥ | svayam eva tarhi nivartatām | evaṃ sati kim atrānyena dhvaṃsena mudgareṇa | tat-sannidhānāpekṣāyāṃ ca svayaṃ śabdārtho riktaḥ | yathā bījam apekṣya svayam eva jāyate 'ṅkura iti na tāvatā tat-prayuktatva-parihāraḥ | atha parihāra eva, tadā tad-apekṣyeti na vaktavyam | tāvatā ca siddhaṃ sādhyam ity anena kim iha (48a) kartavyam | dhvaṃsa mudgarādikam anapekṣya svayam eva bhāvo nivartata iti prāg api nivṛtti-siddhiḥ | vastu-mātrānubandhī ca dhvaṃso nibandhanāntara-nirapekṣa iti,

column2: abhavanotpatter eva saha sthiti-virodhena bhāva-pratiṣedha-rūpatvād ity evaṃ prakāram abhidhānam, tad-virodha-bodha-vaidhuryādi-yuktam iti darśitam | ata evābhāvotpatti-vidhānena ca bhāvasya tādavasthya-prasaṅga iti pramatta-bhāṣitam ity abhidadhānaḥ sphuṭam ayaṃ tapasvī prativāta-kṣipta-bhāsmānātmanam eva cchurayatīti mahā-moha-magnatayā kṛpāpātraṃ mahātām avagantavyaḥ | yadi evaṃ bhavatām apy abhāvo vyavahriyate sa kiṃ svabhāvo yadi na vastu bhāvena vā satyaṃ na virudhyata evāyam | kathaṃ vā virodha-dvaya-vyavasthā | ko vāsya hetuḥ | kādācitkatve akādācitkatve ca bhāvasya saṃkālaṃ kathaṃ na vyavahriyate | kathaṃ vā prāg iva paścād api na kṣaṇa-pramparāprasavaḥ | prasave ca na shaḥ sahānavasthāna-virodhaḥ |

column2: yata eva pracyuti-mātraṃ na kiñcit, bhāvas tu nañ-artha-pratyanīkas tata eva virudhyate | virodho 'py eṣa nānyonya-pratighātaḥ, sattānavasthāna-vat, kim tv anyonya-rūpānanupraveśa-mātram | tac ca vikalpitānubhūtayor apy astīti na doṣaḥ | pracyuti-mātrasya ca kadācid bhāvatvābhāvāt kiṃ hetuneti caturthe visarjanam | kenacid rūpeṇonmajjato hi janakaḥ kalpyeta, akādācitkaṃ ca sarvadāsti vā nāsti vā | tatrāsti-pakṣa-kṣepāt sarvadā nāsty eva tat | vyavahāras tu kādācitkaḥ, bhāva-kāle tad apravṛtteḥ | kathaṃ virodhād eva | bhāva-virodho hy abhāvaḥ pracyuti-svabhāvaḥ kalpanā-viparivartī kathaṃ bhāva-kāle vyavahriyate | bhāva-dharmā hi nirhetuko vā, bhavana-hetu-janito vā, hetv-antara-kṛto vā bhāva-kāle 'pi bhaven nāma, bhāvānvayaṃ ca vyavahāram asyāsādayet | yadā tu nāsya bhāvo na tadā bhāvānuyāyī vyavahāraḥ | vāsanānugas tu virodho niścayavato vastu-darśane vāsanā-prabodha-vaidhuryāt kathaṃ pravarteta |

column2: [121,13] ata eva yāvat sa eva vastv-ātmāstīti vyavasāya, tāvad anavakāśa evābhāva-vyavahāraḥ, kṣaṇabhaṅga-bhāve 'pi tattvataḥ | yadā tu pramāṇa-balād eka-kṣaṇa-sthita-dharmaiva bhāva-svabhāva ity avadhārayati tadā dvitīye kṣaṇe tad-vastūpādeya-kṣaṇa-sama-kālaṃ tad-abhāvaṃ vyavaharati | tat-pramāṇālābhe tu karparādi-vikāra-darśanam apekṣyaivābhāva-vyavahārā iti pañcame visarjanam | ṣaṣṭhe 'pi hetu-kṣayān nodayaḥ sajātīya-kṣaṇa-dhārayā iti |

column2: [121,18] etad uktaṃ sva-rasa-nirdheṣu pūrva-pūrva-kṣaṇeṣu mudgara-sahakāriṇā kṣaṇe sāmāgrī-vaisadṛśyād bandhya-kṣaṇasyotpādanād upādānaṃ kṣīṇam iti nāparasyotpattiḥ | yat kṛte ca kasyacid bandhya-kṣaṇādhāne sajātīya-kṣaṇāntarāpratisandhānam, so 'pi bhāvas tasya bhāvasya virodhī siddha iti sahānavasthāna-virodha-vyavasthā | tenaiva saptame 'pi caturtha-pādena yadi nāma vastv-avastunoḥ paraspara-parihāro virodhaḥ tathāpi na tāttvikatva-hāniḥ | na hi tayoḥ kadācit svabhāva-sāṃkaryam asti | etāvān eva dharma-virodhasyārthaḥ | ata eva sthiti-grahaṇaṃ niyama-sūcana-param | etena tṛtīyo 'pi vikalpo nirastaḥ | tasmān nāśo nāma na prasajyātmā kartavya-rūpo yato hetu-sāpekṣaḥ syāt, nāpy etāvanti dūṣaṇānīti sthitam ||

column2: [122,7] tathā ca nyāyabhūṣaṇa-kāraḥ | tan na, hetu-vādoccheda-prasaṅgāt, vikalpasya sarvatra saṃbhavāt | tathā hi hetutaḥ kiṃ bhavana-svabhāvo bhavatvāhosvid (49a) abhāva-svabhāva iti | yady ādyaḥ pakṣas tadā svayam eva bhavati, tat-svabhāvatvād iti vyartho hetuḥ | dvitīya-pakṣe tv asamartho na hy abhāva-svabhāvaṃ śaśa-viṣāṇādi kenacid utpādayituṃ śakyam | tathā ccheda-dāhādi-hetavo 'pi tat-svabhāvatva-'tat-svabhāvatva-pakṣayoḥ vaiyarthyāsāmarthyābhyām anupapannā draṣṭavyāḥ | tathā caivaṃ sarva-hetu-pratikṣepa-saṃbhavān mokṣādau prayāsaḥ śāstra-śravaṇādau vyartha iti,

column2: [122,13] atrāyaṃ paryanuyujyate | kim anena mūle paraśu-nipāta-prakāreṇa | sarvathā kvacid api hetutayopanīte 'sāmarthya-vaiyarthyalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣaṇam eva na vācyam ity ucyate | tat-tāvad ayuktam, dṛśyate hi nakha-cchedye kuṭhāra-vaiyarthyam, kutṭhāra-cchedye ca nakhasyāsāmarthyam | tathā devadattenaiva yat sādhyaṃ tatra devadatta-sahāyasya yajñadattasya vyāpāra-vaiyarthyam | tad-vinā-kṛtasya punar asāmarthyam | dahanendhana-sāmāgryāṃ satyāṃ rāsabhasya dhūme vaiarthyam asatyām asāmarthyam | yatra vā siddhasādhana-poṣaṇaṃ tatra vaiyarthyam | asiddha-viruddhānaikāntikeṣv anyatama-sattve asāmarthyam iti | ye tu siddha-sādhanasyāpy eteṣv antarbhāvam icchanti, tat-prayāsa-phalaṃ na kiñcit, vaiyarthyasya hetu-dūṣaṇasya sarvathā-śakyāpahnavatvāt, jñāpaka-hetor api pratītiṃ prati kārakatvāc ca | yadi cāsāmarthya-vaiyarthyam adūṣaṇaṃ hetor anya-dūṣaṇābhāvāt sarvasya sarva-siddhir yataḥ kutaścit |

column2: tat tarhi dravyarūpaṃ dravyatvasāmānyāt jñāyate, atha dravyam iti vikalpa-vacasor vā gocarībhavatīti pakṣaḥ | prathama-pakṣe tāvan na doṣaḥ | sāmānyād eva dravyaṃ jāyatāṃ yataḥ kutaścid yenātmanā jātaṃ na punas tad-bhāve hetv-antaram apekṣata iti hi prakṛtam | dvitīya-pakṣe 'pi sutarāṃ na doṣaḥ, dravya-rūpaṃ hi jātam eva prāg api dravya-dhī-dhvani-prasava eva sāmānyāt, na caitāvatā tad-bhāve hetv-antaram apekṣitaṃ bhavati | na hi kāryeṇa kāraṇasya sva-viṣaya-sāmarthya-vyavahāre prāg aniṣpannam(49b) eva tat-sāmarthyaṃ tad-bhāve vā kāraṇam, tad eva kāryaṃ hetv-antaram apekṣita-vat |

column2: [123,18] kiṃ ca, bhinnena paścāt jāyamānenāpi prakāśa-guṇena yadā tāvat prakāśa-guṇa-yuktaḥ saṃpanno dīpaḥ, tadā kiṃ punas tad-bhāve hetv-antaram apekṣate yato dṛṣṭānta-kṣatiḥ syāt | tan na prakriyā-poṣaṇa-trāṇam apramāṇa-parāyaṇena | anubhavānurodhena tu yathābhimatam eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ | na hi prathama-dvitīya-kṣaṇayoḥ sāmanya-yogāyogābhyāṃ viśeṣa-pratītir asti | nāpi dravya-sāmānyayor bhedānubhava iti prakṛtasya tv anyathāpi siddher nātra nirbandhaḥ | tasmān na prakāśaḥ svahetoḥ prakāśa-rūpa-niṣpannas tad-bhāve hetv-antaram apekṣate, vaiyarthyāt | andhakārī-karaṇe 'py asāmarthyād iti siddham |

column2: na khalv asya vikalpasya sarvatrāvatāro vivakṣitaḥ, kiṃ tu tat-svabhāvātat-svabhāva-vikalpa-dvārakam api dūṣaṇaṃ hetor asti tāvad ity atyantāyoga-niṣedha upakrāntaḥ | tato yatraitad dūṣaṇam upapādayituṃ śakyate, tatra dūṣaṇa-bhāvam āviśati | kim anya-cintayā yadi yukti-bhedaḥ | tathā ca vinaśvaratvaṃ nāma kṣaṇikatvaṃ kanīyaḥ kālatvaṃ vā | avinaśvaratvam api drāghīyasā kālena sadāsthāyitayā vā | sarvathā yāvat-kālāvasthitiko bhāvaḥ svahetor udapādi [=udayādi] tad-abhyantare yadi kenacin nāśyeta, tadā yāvat- kālāvasthitir eva notpannaḥ | na hi saṃvatsra-sthāyī cāsau divasa-nāśī ceti svabhāva-dvayaṃ paraspara-viruddham asya sādhu |

column2: virodhe eva niścaye hi yady arthānupraveśo na svabhāve, yathā yady atra patra-pāte dhūmaḥ saṃbhaven niyatam iyam aṅgārā, anyathā tu guñjāpuñja iti na svabhāva-bhedaḥ | tathā yadi divase vinaśyati tad-avadhikam eva hetunā janitam, saṃvatsara-nāśe tu tad-avadhikam iti bhavatu | na tu paraspara-virodhi-svarūpe dvitīyasyaikatra samuccayaḥ | na hi tatrāhani vinaśyann eva saṃvatsara-sthāyī, ardhārdhena vā tad ubhayaṃ bhavitum arhati | vikalpas tu saṃśayātmā jñānasyaiva, na vastuno dharmaḥ | tasmād vastv-eka-svabhāvam eva na viruddha-svabhāvāntara-yogi | etac ca divasādi-sthāyitvaṃ pramāṇena nirūpaṇam arhati satyaṃ naveti | abhyupagamya tu cintitam etat, pramāṇa-vyāhate hetu-sāmarthyāśrayaṇasya durlabhatvāt | tato yady akṣaṇikatāpu tathāpi yāvān asya kālaḥ sthiter avadhis tad-abhyantare hetv-antarasyāsāmarthyaṃ tasya purastād vaiyarthyam iti sthitam | kṣaṇikatve 'pi na tat-kṣaṇe nāśa-kāraṇena kiñcit śakyam iti vyaktam, kṣaṇāntare tu svayam eva nāstīti nārtho 'nartha-hetunā | sadātane tv asamartha evāyam |

column2: [124,23] tasmād vināśe kartavye na kaścit hetur asāmarthya-vaiyarthya-dūṣaṇam atikrāmati | yadārthāntare tu karparādau sa eva mudgaras tābhyāṃ dūṣaṇābhyāṃ na lipyate, tad-vyāpārānantaram eva janma-lābhāt karparasya, evaṃ rāga-dravyasyāpi tad-vyāpārāntaram udaya-bhāji-rakta-vāsasi nāsāmarthya-vaiyarthyam |

column2: [125,1] pāṇṭu-caṇṭātaka-nivartane punaḥ kas tan nivartayati | yadāpi daśādvaye ekam eva vastra-vastu tadāpi tad doṣānativṛttir eva | na hi raktāvastāyām api śubhram eva tad iti nirvahati | tato yadi tadāpi śubhram eva tad vastu na raktāyā avakāśa ity asamarthyaṃ rāga-dravyaṃ, pūrva-rakte tu tan-mātra-rāgāpekṣāyāṃ vyartham | tasmāt sthairyāpekṣayā doṣāvatārāt samayāparādha evaṃ-vidho na vastunaḥ | pūrvasya sva-rasa-nirodhe tad-upādānāpekṣayā rāga-dravyeṇāpūrva-rakta-vastrotpādane tad-doṣasya parihāra-siddheḥ |

column2: [125,6] naivaṃ vastu-sthitir iti cet? nanu tad eva cintyate kīdṛśī vastu-sthitir iti | kim atra kośa-pānena paraḥ pratyāyanīyaḥ | tat kim akāṇṭenaivaṃ vastu-sthitir iti ucyate, pratyabhijñā-prāmāṇyāvalambanasya nirastatvāt |

column2: yady evaṃ tadā prācīna-guṇa-nirākaraṇo 'sāmarthya-vaiyarthya-prāptāv apy apūrva-raktā-guṇotpādanenaiva caritārtho rāga-dravya-vyāpāra iti katham ukta-dūṣaṇa-sparśaḥ | pūrva-niṣpanna-rūpāpekṣayā hi vaiyarthāsāmarthya-cintā prakrāntā nāpūrvāpekṣayā | na hy apūrve 'pi kartavye yady evaṃ rūpaṃ svahetor jātaṃ tadā vaiyarthyam, evaṃ jāte tv asāmarthyam iti nirṇayāvakāśaḥ | nāśanīyaś ca sarvaḥ pūrva-siddha eva bhāvaḥ | sa ca vinaśvaretarayoḥ, prakārāntara-tiraskārad anyatara-svarūpam anativartamāno na vināśa-hetoḥ kalpitasyāsāmarthyam ānarthakyaṃ vā sthātuṃ prabhavati | na caivaṃ hetu-vādoccheda-prasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ | asiddhe hi kārye hetor āśrayaṇam, siddhe ceyaṃ cintā | tadaiva ca yadi hetor evaṃ rūpo niṣpanna iti hetu-puras-kāreṇaiva vāda-pravṛtteḥ | na caivam asiddhe śakyam ity uktam | tat-kathaṃ prakṛtāsmad vikalpasya sarvatra saṃbhavaḥ | vikalpa-mātrasya sarvatra hetu-phala-saṃmate saṃbhave 'pi nāsmadīya-yukter aparādha-bodhaḥ kṛto bhavati |

column2: (50b) athānupalambha-mātrasya sva-sādhya-sādhana-sāmarthya-śūnyataivāparādhaḥ, vikalpa-mātrasya punar asāmarthya-vaiyarthyollekha-śekharasya na hetu-vādāpavāda-śakti-śūnyateti viṣama upanyāsaḥ | aho puruṣa-kāro bhasma-bhūṣaṇasya! evaṃ hi sarvathā hetu-phalāpalāpe sādhu sādhitaṃ dhvaṃsasya hetu-mattvam iti vyaktam ayam ātmānam-ātmanaiva viṭambayati | tad ayaṃ bhāva-svabhāvādi-vikalpaḥ saṃkalpaniveśitaśaktir api viṣaye ca parihāryaḥ kārya-kāraṇa-bhāva-vyavasthitena, anyathā mūlocchedāt prakaraṇa-pravṛtteḥ | siddhopādhis tu vikalpo vināśa-karaṇam eva kavalayati, na kāraṇa-mātram | atiprasaṅga-bhaṅga-bhīruṇā tu bhavatā nādriyate iti yuktam evaitat | tasmāt

column2: prārambha upakramaḥ prastāvaḥ tena saṃbhāvita ādṛtaḥ | sāmānyena kāryakāraṇabhāvasattāṃ vyavasthāpya vināśādau viṣaya-viśeṣe kvacid dhetu-sattā kim astu na vety atra vimarśa eṣo 'smadīyaḥ prastāvānurūpaḥ | hetu-phalonmūlanāya tu viphalaḥ prayāsaḥ, sāmānyena vyavasthāpyaiva prakaraṇa-pravṛtteḥ | na cāyaṃ vikalpaḥ kārya-kāraṇa-bhāva-kṣepāya kṣamaḥ bhavana-svabhāvo 'bhavana-svabhāvo vā hetuto bhavatīti | tathā hi abhavana-dharmā tāvad bandhyā prasūtīti bhavana-svabhāvaś ca, tvan-matena gaganāder abhavanasya kadācid apy abhāvāt, tayos tāvad asāmārthya-vaiyarthya-grasto bhavati hetu-vyāpāraḥ | kādācitkaṃ bhāvaṃ bhavana-dharmāṇam abhavana-dharmakaṃ vā brūhi, na punar ayaṃ kiñcid anapekṣamāṇaḥ kādācitka eva bhavitum arhati, yaś cāpekṣo 'rthaḥ kāla-deśa-svabhāva-niyamāya sa eva hetuḥ | atha bavana-svabhāva iti na sattā-dharmā kiṃ tu utpatti-dharmeti vivakṣitam, tadāpy utpattir ity asata ātma-lābho na kādācitkatvād anya iti tad-vad evottaram | vināśasya tu kādācitkatva-niṣedha uktaḥ |

column2: [126,21] atha hetuto bhavana-dharmā yaḥ sa kiṃ bhavatītaro veti vikalpārtho | tadā ādya-vikalpa eva viśrānto vādaḥ | tathā hi hetuto bhavati, na pūrvam iti na vaiyarthyam, bhavati hetuto nānyato bhavati kuto 'sāmarthyam | atra ca nirbandho bandhya iti diṇ-mātram abhidhīyate, ubhayoḥ siddhatvāt hetu-phala-bhāvasya aprasutatvāc ca | yataś cāyaṃ siddhopādhiko vikalpaḥ san-nāśasyaiva hetor bādhako nāsad-utpādakasya, asamānatvāt nyāyasya yathoktaṃ prāk | tataś cheda-dāhādi-hetavo rakta-dukūla-kāraṇa-vad upapannā eva, mokṣākhyadaśāviśeṣa-hetuś ceti saphala eva tatra prayāsaḥ | tasmān na sato nāśa-hetuḥ kaścit | sva-hetuta eva tāvad deśākāra-vat kālatayāpi niṣpattiḥ ||

column2: yathā hi mudgaraḥ śarkarā-nikāro vā yas tasmāt syān mataḥ, nāśa-hetor anupapatteḥ notpattir nāśasyety uktam | astu vā nāśābhidhānam arthāntaraṃ kāraṇa-balāt | daṇḍavat śarkarā-raktā-nāśe 'pi koṣāntarakam adhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhatu, santu bhāvās tad-avasthā eva, na hi tasya kiñcit-karāḥ | yathā hi mudgaraḥ śarkrā-nikaro vā tasyākiñcit-karaḥ, anyathā nāśābhyupagama-vairyarthya-prasaṅgāt, tathā nāśo 'pi sthitam iti bhāve svakāraṇād utpadyamānas tasya kim aṅga kartum asamarthaḥ | yathā hi tasya hetu-bala-bhāvino na sarvathā nāśaḥ śakyo vāsāmarthya-vaiyarthyābhyām, tathānurūpāṃśe nāśo 'py aśakya eva | tatrāpi svabhāva-bhede pūrva-van naśvaretara-vikalpasyāvatāra-vāraṇābhāvāt, niraṃśe 'pi ca vastuni kalpanānurodhād etad ucyate | tattvatas tv aṃśa-nāśane 'pi sarvathā nāśa eva, sa cāśakya iti sādhitam apūrva-nirvartanam | vastutas tu vāryate | tataḥ yo 'py apūrvaḥ pūrvavat koṣāntara-tirohitaḥ kalpam āstāṃ tat-kṛto vā punar aparo nāśābhidhāno 'rthas tad-vad astu | na tu bhāvasya kiñcid iti sva-jñāna-janana-jala-dhāraṇādi-vyāparānuparama-prasaṅgo durnivāraḥ |

column2: [128,13] svayaṃ nivṛtti-rūpatayā na nāśāntarāvakāśa iti cet | na, samāna-kāla-saṃbhavat nivṛtti-rūpatāyāḥ pratikṣiptatvāt, padārthāntara-vat paryudastam eva rūpam avaśiṣyate | tena ca vināśena niyataṃ parabhūta-vināśākhya-vastu-karaṇaṃ mudgareṇeva, ko hi viśeṣo 'sya tat-paryudasta-rūpatvena mudgarāt, tad ayaṃ param-anapekṣamāṇa eva nāśayati | mudgaras tv enam anapekṣamāṇo nāśa iti syāt | vināśa-saṃjñā-karaṇa-pratilambhas tu bhavet | tām antareṇa tasyāpi mudgarād aviśeṣāt, ākāra-bheda-mātrasya maṇi-mātrādiṣv api bhāvāt |

column2: [129,13] yat punar atra tenotprekṣitam | yathoktaṃ sva-hetuto bhāvo naśvaro 'naśvaro vā jāyate iti, tatrocyate | na vayaṃ vinaśvaram aniśvaraṃ vā jānīmaḥ, santaḥ svahetubhyo jāyante, dhvaṃsante ca hetv-antarebhyaḥ sva-pratyayādhīna-sannidhānebhyaḥ, dhvaṃsaś ca dhvaṃsamānād bhinno hetu-bhedataḥ svabhāva-bhedāc ceti, tatrāpy ucyate | yadi naśvarānaśvara-svarūpam avidvān eva bhavān evam āha, tadā kva nāśo nāma padārthaḥ | kuto vā vyāvṛttyā bhavati vyavasthāpyo yo dhvaṃsamānād bhinnnaḥ saṃpraty eva pratijñātaḥ, sa idānīṃ vinaśvarāvinaśvara-svarūpāparijñānena vyavasthāpyamāna ākāśādiṣv api kiṃ na vyavasthāpyate |

column2: teṣu nāśādarśanād iti cet | nanv anyatrāpi nāśo nāma dṛśyata iti śapatha-gamyam etat | tato vinaśvaretara-svabhāvāviṣkaraṇaṃ bhavataḥ prasahyāyātaṃ kim atra śa[pa] thena | tathā ca sati svahetor eva tad-tad-rūpa-janmani niyatāvatāram asāmarthya-vaiyarthya-dūṣaṇaṃ paśyato 'pi tatra hetv-antara-pratijñānaṃ katham iti vayam api na jānīmaḥ | athedamākūtaṃ vaidarbhya-garbhayā girā pratyakṣata eva kutaścid utpādaḥ kutaścin nāśa upalabhyamāno vinaśvaretara-vikalpena katham apohituṃ śakyaḥ | na hi pratyakṣa-siddhaṃ vikalpa-śatenāpi śātayiyuṃ śakyam, sarva-pramāṇa-vyāpārasya pratyakṣ eva viśrāmād iti ||

column2: atha naśyataḥ svayam eva rūpaṃ bhedāntara-pratikṣepeṇa tan-mātra-jijñāsāyāṃ pṛthag ivādarśyamāno nāśo 'bhipretaḥ, tathā ca dhvaṃsante hetv-antarebhyaḥ ity abhītvaivoktam | evaṃ tarhi daṇḍādibhyaḥ kuṇṭādayo vinaśyanti, na svayam iti siddhānta-niṣṭhāyāṃ dhvaṃsaś ca nirasta-samastārthakriyā ity api supta-vikalpitam eva | tat kim anayā Vācaspatiḥ (52a) abhipraitīti na vidmaḥ | evaṃ tarhi yāvati pratyakṣa-vyāpāraḥ tāvato 'pi katham apahnavaḥ | kiyati cāsau pratyakṣa-vyāpāraḥ | utpadyamāne ca hetv-antarād dhetv-antarān nirudhyamāne ca bhāve tad-utpatti-hetor vināśa-hetur anya iti siddham |

column2: [130,17] kiṃ cotpadyamānaṃ nirudhyamānaṃ ca vastv-ekam anekaṃ vā, ekatvaṃ tāvad viruddha-dharmādhyāsād ayuktam | atha pratyakṣeṇa tathā vyavasthānāt kiṃ kurma iti cet, eka-pratyakṣeṇa ekadaikādhārayor upalabdhau sādhur avirodhaḥ, nīla-catur-asratāvat | yadā tu bhinna-kālam adhyakṣa-dvayam ekaika-rūpa-grāhi, tadā pratyabhijñāna-mātram eva 10 miśrayati | tac cāpramāṇam ity uktam | tato viddha-dharmādhyāsād bheda eva | ekatra tu kṣaṇe vibhāgābhāvān na virodho vyāvṛtti-bheda-mātreṇaikatra bhāvāt | tathā hi sa eva bhāva-kṣaṇaḥ prāg-abhāvād utpadyamāna ucyate, paścād-bhāvān nirudhyamāna ucyate |

column2: [131,1] na, vyāpakadvāreṇa virodhasyaiva siddheḥ | prathamakṣaṇe 'py utpadyamāno bhāvo vā bhāvavikṣaṇāntarāvathānena vyāpto na prācīnāvasthitiṃ kṣaṇam api spṛśati, nirudhyamānaś cāsau carama-kṣaṇe prācya-kṣaṇāntarāvasthānena vyāpto, na ca bhāvinīm avasthitiṃ kṣaṇam api spṛśatīti virodha eva | kṣaṇe punar ekasminn eṣa vibhāga iti vyāvṛtti-mātra-bhedo na virodhaḥ | tasmāt kṣaṇadvayam api sthiti-vivakṣāyām udaya-nidhana-dharmayor virodhān naikatvam | anekatva-pakṣe ca prācīnaṃ vastu mudgarādi-parigaṇita-vināśa-hetu-vyatirekeṇāpi nirudhyamānaṃ svahetor eva niyata-kāla-sthiti-dāna-sāmarthyam uddīpayatīti na vināśa-hetuḥ kaścit | athāparigaṇitā eva vināśahetavaḥ, tatra durupalakṣaḥ kaścid dhetur anirjñāyamānaḥ svanibandhanaṃ nidhanam ādadhītīti kim ayuktam, evaṃ tarhi pratikṣaṇam api vināśa-sambhāvanāyā na pracyutir iti vyarthaṃ vināśa-hetu-vyavasthāpanam | parigaṇitasya hi bhūyo lakṣaṇasya hetoḥ prasiddha-pradhvaṃsalakṣaṇāt prāg-abhāva-niścayena vināśa-vyavasthā mā bhūd iti sahetukatvaṃ vināśasya sādhayitum ārabdham | sūkṣmatayā tu durupalakṣaṇasyāpi hetoḥ svīkāre prayatna-vaiyarthyam āyātam ity alaṃ mithyā-vikalpena | tasmāt sthitimati vastuni sarvasyākiñcitkaratva-pratipādanāt santaḥ svahetubhyo jāyante dhvaṃsante ca hetv-antarebhya ity artha-padam etat | tat kutaḥ idaṃ maṇimantrauṣadham indra-jālaṃ bhāvena śikṣitaṃ yad ayam avikalānya-darśana-pratyayas tad-avastha eva kadācid adhyakṣaḥ (52b) atyakṣaś ceti |

column2: [131,17] nanu kṣaṇika-nītāv evāyaṃ doṣa ukto yuktaś ca | yad āha śaṃkaraḥ, na hi bhāvasya nivṛtter utpattim antareṇa prāg iva paścād api svarūpa-hāniḥ, yenāyaṃ tadaivānupalambha-viṣayo na pūrvaṃ hānau vā paścāt saivāsya nivṛtter utpattir iti |

column2: [131,21] nivṛttyādi-nāmnaḥ padārthāntarasyotpattiḥ bhavatu mā vā bhūt, yata evāsau kṣaṇa-sthiti-niyato 'rthaḥ, tata eva kṣaṇāntaram avyāpnuvan kṣaṇāntare nāstīty ucyate, sa evārtho bhāvasya kṣaṇāntare nāśo jāta ity anena vacasocyate | nāpūrva-vastūtpādo vidhīyate | chandato hi vacasāṃ pravṛttiḥ | arthas tu nirūpaṇīyaḥ | tatra yady eka-kṣaṇādhīnatayā kṣaṇāntare niyata-sattāvasāya-siddhiḥ, tāvataiva caritārto vināśa-vādaḥ, kim atra kasyacid utpatti-paryeṣaṇayā | na hi gṛhe eva devadatto 'stīti sarvatrānyatra vastv-antaram abhidhāna-nirodha-bodhanam iti nyāyaḥ |

column2: astu, tad artham eva niyama-nibandhana-nipāta-prayogāt | kevalaṃ kiñcid vastu vidyamānam utpadyamānaṃ vā na pratīti-patha-prasthāyi, niṣedha-mātrasyaiva pratīteḥ | tāvataiva ca devadattam anusarataḥ pravṛtti-nivṛtti-pāṭavam āpanīpadyate | vastv-antara-pratītāv api hi vihitāyāṃ gṛhād anyatra yāvan na niyamānusāreṇadevadattasya prasajyātmānaṃ niṣedham avasthāpayati tāvan na susthaḥ | tasmād aspṛṣṭa-vastu-rūpam abhāva-mātram avaśya-pratipādyam |

column2: [132,9] na cānyatra nāstīty anena vastu-rūpaṃ kiñcid vidhāya tad eva param asti na devadatta iti krama-vatī pratītir anubhava-viṣayaḥ, yathā gṛha evāstīty anena nānyatreti | bhavatu caivam, tathāpi paścād abhāva-mātra-pratītyaiva viśrāmaḥ | anyathā parāpra-vastu-rūpa-pratipattāv eva puruṣāyuṣam upayujyet, na prakṛta-niṣedha-bodha-siddhiḥ | tasmād yathātra niṣedha-mātraṃ mandirād anyatra devadattasya vyavahriyate, tan-mātram eva ca devadattasyānyatrābhāvaḥ pratīti-gocara ity-ādi vyavahārasyāpy arthaḥ, tathā ekatraiva kṣaṇe 'sti bhāvaḥ, kṣaṇāntare nāsti | kṣaṇāntare tasyābhāvaḥ pratīyata iti niṣedha-mātram anyatra kṣaṇe khyāpyate, na vastu-rūpa-saṃsparśaḥ | nāpi tad-apekṣā-niṣedha-siddhaye 'pi | evaṃ svarūpa-hānir ity api niṣedha-mātra-vyavahāra eva | tatra ca na kasyacid utpattyā sattayā vopayoga iti katham ucyate nivṛtteḥ utpattim antareṇa svarūpa-hānir iti | ata eva hānau vā paścāt saivāsya nivṛtter utpattiḥ ity api pravāhāpātaḥ pātaka-vat parihāryaḥ | paścāt svarūpa-hānir ity api hi paścān niṣedha-vyavahāra-mātram, na tu (53a) kasyacid vastu-rūpasyotpattir iti | sa ca niṣedha-vyavahāro devadattasyaivānyatra kvacit sattā-niyama-pratibandhād avyavasthita-saṃvādī |

column2: [132,22] etena yat nyāyabhūṣaṇo 'py āha, ko hy evaṃ śraddadhīta pratyutpannāvasthāyām eva san bhāvaḥ paścāt tv asan, na ca paścān naśyatīti | tatrāpi kaḥ punar evam āha, na paścāt naśyatīti | yadi paścān naśyati tadā paścān nāśotpattiḥ svīkṛteti cet | yadi tvam eva vacasām artheṣu svāmī |

column2: [133,1] syād etat | dvidhā tv artha-sthitiḥ, pramāṇānusāriṇī samayānusāriṇī ca | prathamāyāṃ paścān naśyatīti paścād asann iti vyavahriyata ity evārthaḥ samarthitaḥ | ataḥ pramāṇa-parāyaṇena katham abhidhātuṃ śakyaṃ paścād asan na ca paścān naśyatīti | dvitīyāyāṃ tu na virodhaḥ | yasya hi paścān naśyatīti paścān nāśotpattir iṣṭā taṃ prati paścād asan | na san vyavahartavyo na ca paścān naśyati | na cāsya paścān nāśa-vastūtpattir iti katham aśraddhā-viṣayaḥ |

column2: [133,6] tad apariniṣṭhārtha-tattva-vacana-vibhrama-mātreṇa grāmya-jana-manohareṇa samaya-nirvāha-manoratha iti kaṣṭam | tasmāt svahetor eka-kṣaṇa-niyata-sthitir udbhūd bhāva ity eva nānyadā san, na tu kasyacid utpattyā hetos tu tādṛk sāmarthyaṃ kiṃ saṃbhāvanā-viṣaya iti yadi cintayasi, tadāpi yadi janane sāmarthyaṃ tadāvaśyaṃ kenacid rūpeṇa kāryam utpādayan kṣaṇa-mātra-sthāyināpi rūpeṇa kiṃ notpādayet | sarvaṃ tu rūpam aspṛśan kāryaṃ kuryād dhetur iti kasya śraddhā-viṣayaḥ | tato yathāyaṃ bhāvo niyata-deśo niyata-vastu-saṃsthānādy-ākāraḥ sva-hetor eva samutpadyate, tathā niyata-kālo 'pīti kim asaṃbhāvyam atra | na ca deśādi-niyamena svarūpa-saṃkocam abhāva eva bhāvasya bhāvayatīti vācyam | na hy abhāvo bhāvam utpannaṃ vā saṃkocayet | kāraṇena saha saṃbhūya saṃkucitam eva cotpādayet | atra pakṣe pṛthak pauruṣa-rahitaḥ kāraṇa-sāmagry-antarbhūto 'bhāvo 'pi nāma yadi bhāva-sādhakaḥ kaścid upapādayituṃ śakyaḥ, kiṃ naśchinnam | yādṛśī tādṛśī vā kāraṇa-sāmagrī kāryaṃ kuryāt | yathā tu niyata-deśākāraṃ kurute tathā niyata-kālam api kurtuṃ kas tasyāḥ śakti-vidhāta iti brūmaḥ, yatas tad-artham arthyate parotpattiḥ paścāt | prathama-pakṣe 'pi kiṃ tāvat sa bhāvaḥ sva-hetor viśva-rūpa utpanno niyataḥ kriyate 'bhāvena | na vā kenāpi rūpeṇa niṣpannaḥ kenacid vā niṣpanna eva na tu deśākāra-kālair iti vikalpāḥ |

column2: [133,22] antyas tāvad ayuktaḥ | yena hi rūpeṇa niṣpannaḥ sa eva tasyākāraḥ, sa ca na kvacid bhāvam antareṇa, kvacid bhāvo 'pi na kadācid abhavata iti katham ākārādi-parihāraḥ | mā bhūt tathaivaṃ kevalaṃ kenacid rūpeṇotpādayituṃ śaknuvataḥ sva-hetor anyatra kim ālasyam īrṣyā vā, pramāṇenaikatra śakti-niyamānirvāhāt | madhyamīye tu kiṃ-kṛtaḥ kāraṇa-bhāvaḥ, rāja(53b) prasādo vā |

column2: [134,1] ādye 'pi kalpe sakala tri-bhuvanākāra-cchedana-sahābhāva-karṣiṇaḥ kṣaṇāntarāvasthiti-cchedana-mātre aṇīyasi kārye paryāloca eva nāsti | tato deśādi-saṃkoca-kāriṇaivābhāva-nāmnā pūrva-siddhena siddhe kāla-saṃkoce 'pi kim akāraṇam anyaḥ kālāntara-bhāvī kāraṇāntarāpekṣaḥ siddho yaḥ sthāyī gaveṣyate ity uktaprāyam |

column2: [134,6] praty arthaṃ bhedo 'bhāvasyeti cet | sarvathā 'nupalabhya-svabhāvatve sāhasam etat | ato vyomādeḥ sarva-dharma-nirmāṇa-vat sarvato vyāvartanam api kiṃ neṣyate | na ca prācīnam evaṃ vyāpāra-bhāvam anubhavaḥ kṣamate | tasmāt sva-kāraṇād eva deśādi-niyata iva kāla-niyato 'pi jāta iti na sthira-pakṣa-vat kṣaṇika-pakṣe 'pi vīkṣaṇādi-prasaṅgaḥ, bhāvasyaivābhāvāt | sthira-pakṣe tu cāsti tad-avasthś ceti na nivarate prasaṅgaḥ padārthāntarotpattāv api tasya tatrākiñcit-karatvāt | aprastutābhidhānaṃ ca bhāva-nivṛttau prastutāyāṃ vastv-antarodaya-varjanāt |

column2: [134,12] nanu bhāva-nivṛttau prastutāyāṃ nivṛtter udayo 'padiśyate iti kim aprastutam atra | nanu tāvad eva nivṛttiḥ prasajyātmā yāvan nodayopadeśaḥ | udaye tu tat-paryudasta-vastv-antara-vidhānāt punar arthāpattyā nivṛtty-ākṛṣṭiḥ, na tu saiva nivṛtir-vastutvād eva, anyathātiprasaṅgāt | yat tu śaṃkaraḥ, bhāvād bhāvāntara-vad arthāntaratvāviśeṣe kathaṃ sa eva tasyaiva nivṛttir iti cet | atra vastu-svabhāvair uttaraṃ vācyaṃ yeṣāṃ sva-hetubhyaḥ saha-sthiti-virodhenaivotpattiḥ, na hy arthāntaratvād anyatra saha-sthiti-virodhābhāve bhāvatannivṛttyor api tasyābhāva iti nyāyam, tayor eva sahasthitivirodhasya pramāṇena siddhatvāt | na hi yathā kaścid arthāntaratayā anyeṣām ahetur evaṃ sva-kāryasyāpi mā bhūt tādṛg etad apīti |

column2: etad eva nyāyabhūṣaṇo 'pi, tad api dvi-vidhasyāpi virodhasya ghaṭanād apāstam | yadi ca virodhād arthāntarasyāpi nivṛtti-bhāvo varaṃ mudgarasyaivāstv ity api darśitam | na ca pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vā nivṛttau pravṛttam | tad-virodhaś ca pramāṇa-siddho 'vaśya-vaktavya iti sundaram |

column2: [135,8] yat tu nyāyabhūṣaṇaḥ, yadi tasya na kiñcid bhavati tataḥ pratiṣedho 'pi na tasya bhavatīty apratiṣiddha-svarūpas tad-avasthatvāt prāg ivopalabhyeteti, prāg eva parihṛtam etat | tathā hi pratiṣedho 'pi na tasya bhavatīti yadi pratiṣedhākhya 'pi padārtho notpadyata ity arthaḥ, tadā satyam etat, na tu tāvataivāpratiṣiddha-svarūpatvam arthasya, sva-hetutaiva kṣaṇāntare pratiṣiddhatāpratipādanāt | (54a) atha vācanika-pratiṣedho vivakṣitas tadā kas tam apahastayati | kevalam atra pakṣe prāg ivopalabhyetety asaṃbaddham, na hi yo yadā nāsti sa tadopalabhyaḥ | anyathā kānyakubja-sthito 'pi pāṭaliputre dṛśyeta | māndhātā 'pi vādyopalabhyeta |

column2: [135,15] nanv adya māndhātur abhāvas tena nopalambhaḥ | ko vai anyathā prāha | kevala-ṣaṣṭhī-nirdeśād bhedāvasāye 'pi na tato bhinnaḥ padārtho vidhīyate, yāvān evārtho māndhātādya nāsti tat-kāla-niyata-sattākatvāt, tāvān eva māndhātur adyābhāva iti | na-nu samānam etad api yāvān evārtho māndhātur adyābhāva iti tāvān eva māndhātādya nāstīti |

column2: yad apy ucyate | tat-kāla-niyata-sattākatvād iti, tatrāpi tat-kāla evāstīti kālāntare abhāva eva pratipādyata iti kim atrādhikam abhihitam | uktam evaitat | tathāpy ucyate, bhedābheda-nideśayor eka evārthas tattvataḥ kevalaṃ yadi yadi bhinna-vastu-siddhiḥ pramāṇa-balāvalambinī, tadādya nāstīty asyāpi vākyasyādyābhāvo 'stīty ayam evārthaḥ |

column2: ka evaṃ sādhur abhidadhīteti cet | na ko 'py abhidhattāṃ prakṛta-siddher avirodhāt | na ca sādhor apy etat pāṭho 'saṃbhavī sarvathā kiṃ tat sādhur nābhidadhīteti tad-śrutavataḥ praśne tat-pāṭha-mātreṇa sādhutā kṣater abhāvāt | kūrma-romṇāṃ tu mithyātvaṃ svīkṛtam ity api kim asādhunaiva vaktavyam | nāpi sarvathā mithyaivedam | tathā māndhātā nāstīti nādya sthīyate māndhātreti vā vyaktā kartṛ-śaktir na vastutāṃ pratyujjīvayati |

column2: [136,13] niṣedha eva tasyā vartata iti cet | ata eva vivakṣā paratantryam apeta-sandeham | tasmāt kāraka-śakti-nirdeśena vastutā-siddhi-pratyāśā phena-saṃghātena toya-taraṇa-manoratham anuharati | tad evaṃ nābhidhānādhīnam artha-tattva-vaśenedaṃ tv abhidhānam iti bheda-nirdeśa evādya abhāvo 'sya jāta iti bhinna-vastūtpattim ivāsaṃśan adyedaṃ nāstīty asya prasajya-pratiṣedha-mātra-sūcakasyārthe sthāpyo, na viparyaye, pramāṇāśaraṇatvād asya vibhāgasya | tat-kāla-niyamena kālāntare 'bhāvābhidhānaṃ ca siddha-sādhanam, vastv-antarotpattir eva hi niṣidhyate kālāntare, (54b) na ca prasajya-pratiṣedha-vyavahāra-mātraṃ pratiṣidhyate | tad asya bādha-vidhāna-pratipādane 'pi na paramārtha-sat padārthāntara-siddhiḥ |

column2: iti nyāyasya svayaṃ pratijñānāt | sa cābhāvo bhavan paścād eveti sphuṭataram asya kādācitkatvāt sahetutvaṃ vastutvaṃ ceti | tathā ca saha evāha, yasya bhāvasya paścād abhāvaḥ sa eva nāśa ity ucyate | kathaṃ bhāvasya vināśo 'nyo vā kaścin nopalabhyate | atha bhāvasya vināśa ucyate, kiṃ tu sa bhavatīti nocyate, bhavatīty abhidhāne ko doṣaḥ | bhāva eva syād iti cet | tat-kim idānīm abhidhānād evārthasya rūpa-parivarto bhavati | yadi ca bhavet tato jāyata ity ucyatām | janmāpy abhāvasya kuta iti cet | kādācitkatvāt | akādācitkatve tu pratyutpannāvasthāyām apy abhāvaḥ syād iti |

column2: [137,15] atrocyate, vyavahāra-śabdena tāvad asmākaṃ niścaya-vacasī abhimate, vacanaṃ ca vikalpena 8sahaikaviṣayam eva | vikalpasya ca grāhyādhyavasāya-bhedena dvividho viṣayaḥ | tatra yat pratibhāsaṃ vikalpa-jñānam ājāyate tad grāhyam ucyate | yad āśraye tu pravṛtti-nivṛttī tad adhyavaseyam, yathā paścād abhāvo bhāvasyaiva jāta9 ity asyaiva vikalpasyārthāntarotpattiḥ ( || )

column2: sākṣān nirbhāsamānā grāhyā tad-bhāvārthakriyārthino nivṛtter āśraya-bhūtā ca tad-vivikta-tat-kāla-deśa-svabhāva-vastv-avasthādhyavaseyā, yatas tad-vikalpodaye vināśākhya-vastūtpatti-parāmarśa-vimukhaḥ pratiṣedhya-bhāvārthkriyārthī tad-deśa-kālātmani vastuni na pravartate, api tu nivartate | tatas tad-deśa-kāla-vastv-avasthādhyavaseya ucyate | tatra pratibhāsamāna-vastv-antarāpekṣayā vyavahāra-mātram ucyate, yatnena nirūpatayā nayana-sahasreṇāpy udīyamāna-padārthāntarasyānupalabdheḥ | tatas tad-visaṃvāde 'pi yatra pravṛtti-nivṛttibhyāṃ pariniṣṭhita-vyāpāro vikalpaḥ saṃpadyate, tam adhyavaseyaṃ viṣayam apekṣya na visaṃvāda-saṃvādaḥ |

column2: [138,11] tataḥ pracyutir astīti na pracyuti-rūpāt pracyavata ity ayam evārthaḥ | na tv asti prayoga-mātreṇa kalpitasyāpi trai-guṇya-mayatvāder vidhiḥ | yathā ca pratiṣiddha-ghaṭa-rūpād atirikta-rūpāpekṣaiva nāsti ghaṭo nityatayā kṣaṇikatayā veti sādhu, tathā nāsti pracyutir ity api vastutvenety apekṣaiva sādhu | nirupādhis tv asti pracyutir iti tat svarūpāpracyutau na duṣyati | yāvac ca na pratiṣedhya-bhāvas tāvat pracyutiḥ, svarūpāpracyutiḥ, parasparābhāva-rūpatvād anayoḥ |

column2: [141,1] yat punar āha, vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ | tatrānavasthā nābhyupagamyate yatrānavasthāyāṃ kiñcid dṛṣṭaṃ virudhyeta, na cātra dṛṣṭaṃ kiñcid virudhyate | yā tāvad ghaṭasya paṭādibhyo vyāvṛttiḥ, tayaiva ghaṭādibhyo vyāvṛttaḥ siddhaḥ | tatra vyāvṛtty-antarānavasthāyāṃ na kiñcid vighaṭam | vyāvṛtti-vyāvṛtti-paramparā-grahaṇopakṣīṇa-śaktitvād vastu vyāvṛttaṃ na sidhyatīti cet | na, viśeṣaṇa-viparyastānām api grahaṇābhyupagamād iti | tatrāpy ucyate,

column2: agṛhītam api kila vilocanaṃ grāhayati rūpam iti tad-viśeṣaṇa-viśeṣaṇam agṛhītam api viśeṣaṇaṃ grāhayatīti manyamānasya prathamam api viśeṣaṇam agṛhītam eva grāhayiṣyati viśeṣyam iti kṛtaṃ tad-grahaṇenāpi | na cāyaṃ viśeṣaṇa-kramaḥ | tato yathā prathamam eva viśeṣaṇa-grahaṇam anapekṣya lakṣayituṃ viśeṣyam aśaktaṃ tathā dvitīyādy apīti katham ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ (56a) śobhām abhyeti | yathā hy abhāvopādhigrahaṇam antareṇa saṃkīrṇa-grahaṇa-bhītiḥ, tathā so 'py upādhir asaṃkīrṇo 'gṛhyamāṇaḥ kathaṃ para-bhedako nāma, svayaṃ viṣṭambhi-dravya-vat | evaṃ paramparāpekṣāyāṃ vyāvṛtta-vastunaḥ kalpair api grahaṇābhāvād astamayo durvāraḥ |

column2: [141,17] yadi ca viśeṣaṇam abhāvaḥ tadā svahetor eva bhinna-bhāva-saṃbhave bhinna-darśana-vikalpanayor arthāpattyā siddheḥ kim abhāvena | na hi bhinnam abhinnam anubhavitavyam abhrānta-pratyayena | nāpi bhinnam anubhūtaṃ bhinna-saṃkalpa-virodhi | athābhāvam antareṇa na bhinnaṃ nābhinnaṃ, kva tarhi kāraka-vyāpāra ity abhāvaḥ kāraka eva svīkṛto bhavati | tathāpi sva-hetor eva bhinnotpattau sarvam aviruddham iti nopādhivādaḥ saṃvāda-viṣayaḥ |

column2: nanu svarūpeṇa buddhaṃ vyāvṛttam avyāvṛttaṃ vā | yadi vyāvṛttaṃ, tadā 'narthikā vyāvṛttiḥ | na ced vyāvṛttaṃ, vastu-saṃkara-prasaṅgaḥ | svarūpeṇeti ko 'rthaḥ | kiṃ vyāvṛttiṃ vinā, kiṃ vā vyāvṛtti-vyatiriktena rūpeṇa | vyāvṛttiṃ vināti na yuktam, vyāvṛtter nitya-dharmatvāt | yo hi dharmaḥ kadācid bhavati tena dharmeṇe vinā 'pi dharmī vyapadiśyate, yathā kuṇḍalena vinā kuṇṭalena vinā puruṣo 'kuṇḍalī, nāśāt prāg aniṣṭa iti | na ca vastv-antarād vyāvṛtti-vihīnaṃ vasu kadācit, yathā na gotva-vihīno 'sti gauḥ, nauṣṇya-vihīno 'gniḥ |

column2: [142,19] atha [|ayaṃ? ] cārthaḥ, yadi vyāvṛtta-svabhāvo bhāvaḥ sva-hetor udaya-vān, tadā tad upajaniyatayā pratīttyā vyāvṛtta eva pratyetavyaḥ | vyāvṛttilakṣaṇam arthāntaraṃ vināpi na hi vyasanam evaitad arthasya pramāṇena vā kenacid avadhāritam, yat mayā pratyayāntara-sākalye 'pi tām antareṇa na sva-jñānam utpādanīyam iti | nāpi jñānasya tad-utpāditasya tayā vinā tad agrahaṇa-graho nāma tad iyam anarthikā vyāvṛttiḥ vyāvṛtta-pratyayasyānyathāpi saṃbhavān na kalpanīyā |

column2: [143,1] atha na (56b) sva-hetor vyāvṛtta utpanno bhāva utpannaś ca tataḥ saṃkīrṇa-svabhāvasyotpannasya vyāvṛttir evāsatī kathaṃ vyāvṛtta-pratyayam utpādayed ity asamarthā | evaṃ ca codya-prakrame siddhām eva vyāvṛttim avasthāpya vyāvṛtter nitya-dharmatvādi kutropayogi | na hy anena prathama-pakṣokta-vaiyarthya-parihāra-vārtā | tathā hi vyāvṛtta-pratyaya-sāmarthyād vyāvṛttir nāma kalpyate, sa ca vyāvṛtta-pratyayo 'nyathāsiddha iti kim asyāḥ kalpanayeti codye vyāvṛttiḥ nityo dharmaḥ, atas tena vineti na śakyam ity uttara-vādinaḥ kiṃ kena saṅgatam | yāvatā vyāvṛtti-vyatireke sthityaiva vyāvṛtta-pratyayasyānyathānupapattivādasyāyaṃ nāvasaraḥ, tadvidhūya siddhānta-mātra-kathayā kim atra |

column2: yac cātraiva pakṣe pakṣe dvitīyaṃ vikalpatam anena, kiṃ vā vyāvṛttir iti vyatiriktena vyāpāreṇeti, tad anabhyupagamenaiva gatam, svarūpeṇa vyāvṛttaṃ buddham iti viśvasmād vyāvṛtta-rūpaṃ buddham ity etasyārthasya vivakṣitatvāt | na cādya-vaiphalya-parihāra ity uktam | nāpi dhani-dṛṣṭāntena bhinna-vyāvṛtti-siddhir-niyama-hetor abhāvāt dhana-vad vā saṃyoga-samavāyānapekṣo, viśeṣaṇāntarasya daṇḍa-pāṇḍaratvāder api saṃbandha-vyavahāraḥ syāt | tasmān netaretarābhāvo nāma kaścit, svahetor eva paraspara-vyavacchinnasyotpatteḥ |

column2: samavāyasyaivābhāvāt kva sattā-saṃbandhādiḥ | astu vā so 'pi, tathāpy apūrvātma-lābha evotpattiḥ dharmādharmāntarāṇāṃ tu bhāvābhāvau na sādhaka-bādhakau | kiṃ ca kāryasyāpy abhāvasya na prāg-asataḥ sattā-saṃbandha iti kp 'rthaḥ | kiṃ prāg-asann eva na bhavati | atha paścād api na sattvam asya | ubhayathāpi kutaḥ kāryatvam ākāśākāśa-kuśeśaya-vat | prāg-asataḥ sattvam astu paścān na tu sattāyogaḥ |

column2: [146,1] yac cedaṃ nivṛtter apy ādimattvam ity ucyata iti, tadāpi nādhikaṃ kiñcit | sā ca nivṛttir abhāva-rūpeṇaiva (57b) ādimatīti punar na sahāmahe, kāryāntara-sādāraṇatāyāḥ pratipādanāt | ādeśa-mātram etat bhūbhujām eva śobhate | bhāvopalambha-kāle tad-rūpānupalambhād ity api paścād rūpopalambhe śobhām ābhajati | sa ca nāsti, kumbhā-saṃbhava-vikalpa-mātraṃ tu saṃketānurodheneti darśitam |

column2: ity uktam | tathā cānenaivotthāpitam bhāva eva kṣaṇa-sthiti-dharmā nāśā iti tasyābhedam eva brūmaḥ | naśanaṃ nāśa iti prasajyātmā dvidhā vyākartavyaḥ, tattvatas tāvad vastutva-virahāt tattvānyatva-śūnya evāsau bhāvo na bhavatīti tad bhāva-niṣedha-mātra-pātraṃ tu kharaśṛṅgādivat | saṃvṛttau tu yathā kāla-bhedena vikalpyamānaḥ kādācitka iti pratibhāti, tathā sarvopākhyā-viraha-rūpatayā bhāvād bhinna iva pratibhātīti nāvastutve 'pi lakṣaṇa-bhedākhyāna-virodhaḥ | evaṃ ca sati saṃvṛttyā lakṣaṇa-bhede bhāvābhāvayor bhedasyeṣṭatvāt | tattvena ca lakṣaṇaikatā-virahe bhāvasya tenaikya-niṣedhāt katham advaitaprasaṅgopālambhaḥ |

column2: [146,12] yad apy āha, nanv abhāvasya sarva-dharma-vivekalakṣaṇatvād utpattir na yuktā | sā hi bhāva-dharma eveti | na, jñeyatvāder bhāva-dharmasyābhāve 'pi sad-bhāvād ity-ādi, tad apy asāram | na hi sādhāraṇa-dharma-yoga-mātreṇa virodha-pratiniyatānām api dharmāṇām avakāśaḥ, hutāśanasyāpi śaittya-prasaṅgāt, abhāvasyaiva vā sarvatra sad-bhāva-prasaṅgāt jñeyatvādīnām api niṣedhāt | utpattiś cābhūtvā bhavana-rūpatayā bhāva-dharma evety āpāditam eva |

column2: [147,19] yat tu svayaṃ na bhavatīti, ko 'rthaḥ | kiṃ svayam evāyam abhāvaḥ | kiṃ vā svayam abhavanaṃ karoti | uta bhavanaṃ na karoti | atha kiñcin na karoti | svayaṃ vā na kiñcit | kiṃ vā svayam abhāvī-bhavatīti vikalpya dūṣaṇam ārabdham, tad api marmac chedikā-janitārtarava-prāyam |

column2: [148,1] sva-hetor hi tat-svabhāvo 'tat-svabhāvād vyāvṛtta utpannaḥ | sa kathaṃ paścād apy atat-svabhāvaḥ syāt | na hi laghu-svabhāvād vyāvṛttaḥ pāṣāṇaḥ kadācil laghu syād iti | tad api plavata eva | yathā hi deśāntara-sthiti-vyāvṛtta utpannaḥ, tathā kṣaṇāntara-sthiti-vyāvṛtto 'pi kathaṃ kṣaṇāntara-sthiter avakāśa ity uktaprāyam |

column2: [150,1] evaṃ yathā yadi ghaṭo 'dyāpi syān na karparaika-rūpa-niyatā pratipattis tathā na nāśaika-rūpa-niyatā pratipattir iti balād ghaṭābhāva-niścayo bhavatu, yadi pūrvaṃ ghaṭābhāvaḥ syāt, sa ca nāsti | tad-bhāve 'pi kiṃ nāśena, kapālenaiva pratiyoginā gatārthatvāt | na ca nāśa-pratītirapy astīty uktam, tasmāt sataḥ (59a) pradhvaṃsane sad-rūpeṇāsad-rūpeṇa vā dūṣaṇam uktaṃ kathaṃ sad-rūpeṇa sato 'sato vā niścaye kartavye syād iti na samānaḥ parihāraḥ |

column2: na, indranīlādimaṇikariṇajālake tad abhāvāt | anupalakṣyas tatra sparśa iti kalpanaṃ nāndhakārād bibheti | tasmād rūpamātram ubhayam astu | na hi dṛṣṭe 'nupapannaṃ nāma | yadi cāśrayo 'vaśyamṛgyaḥ maṇikuṭyādikam asty eva | na ca vastu-vyavasthāyāṃ pratyakṣa-pratibhāsam āśrayataḥ pratibhāsa-viplavena vyabhicārābhidhānaṃ dhīmato dhinoti | anyathā vātapittakṣobhādinā jvalitastambhādisaṃdarśanāt satyam api jvalitastambhādikam asatyaṃ syāt | prakṛtipratyāpattau tu yathā tatpratibhāsābhāvaḥ, tathā nayanonmīlanakāle nīlābhāvaviplavasyāpi | andhakārādarśanaṃ tu svasthāvastāpekṣam eva yathopavarṇitaviśeṣam | tatpratibhāsasya ca pratyakṣasaṃbhavasāmagrīvigha[ṭ] ne vighaṭanaṃ guṇa eva nāparādhaḥ pratyakṣa-svabhāvatāyā iṣṭatvāt |

column2: yad āha | bhāvasya vyatiriktāṃ nivṛttim anicchadbhir aśakyā svarūpa-nivṛttir avasthāpayitum, yā hi tasya prāktanī kācid avasthā bhavadbhir arthakriyā-nirvartana-yogyā dṛṣṭā saiva yady uttara-kālam apy anuvarteta tarhi svarūpeṇaiva nivṛttau bhāvaḥ katham avasthāpyeta | tadānīm ayaṃ naṣṭo bhāvo, na sapadi sva-hetu-pratilabdha-svarūpātirekiṇī tasya kācid avasthotpadyeta ||

column2: [154,1] utpattau saiva tasyātmāntaraṃ jātām ity atādavasthyas | atādavasthyam evāsya vināśaṃ brūmaḥ | tādavasthye tādātmyam eva svarūpeṇa nivṛtto bhāva ity asya śabdasya satyam arthaṃ na vidmaḥ | svarūpa-nivṛttiḥ khalv iyaṃ bhavantī bhāva eva syāt, bhāvād anyā vā | tattve sva-kāraṇebhyo niṣpannasyānyathānutpattāv utpatter ārabhya sattvān nityatvaṃ prasajyate, anyathātve ca tad eva nivṛtter anyatvam iti priyam anuṣṭhitaṃ priyeṇa | tasmād utsṛjya vibhramaṃ nāśotpattir eva naṣṭatvam abhyupagantavyam | tat kim ucyate naṣṭasyādarśanam, na ca tasya kiñcid bhavatīti | adarśanaṃ naṣṭasya punar abhāva-darśanam eva | ātma-hānam abhāvotpattim eva vayam aṅgī-kurma iti sarvam anavadyam | akṣaṇikāḥ santaḥ, kāraṇavattvāt | yat kāraṇavat tad akṣaṇikam, yathā bhāva-vināśaḥ | kāraṇavantaś ceme santaḥ | tasmād akṣaṇikā iti |

column2: [154,10] kāraṇavat tv asya (60b) sādhya-viparyaye vṛtti-śaṅkā vināśa-hetu-mattvam eva nivartayatīti prasiddha-vyāptikā-kāraṇavattvād akṣaṇikatva-siddhir iti, vyatirikta-nivṛttim antareṇāpi svarūpa-nivṛtter upapāditattvāt | tataś ca kṣaṇād ūrdhvaṃ kutaḥ prāktana-śaktāvasthā-sthitiḥ | vyatiriktotpāde 'pi kathaṃ naṣṭo nāma | atādavasthyam atādātmyaṃ ca jātam ity asyātyakṣarasya sva-hetor evāvasthā-svabhāvāntara-virahito 'yaṃ jāta ity evārtha uktaḥ | tan-mūlakaḥ ātādavasthyādi-vyavahāra eva paścād bhāvī na tad-vikalpa-pratibhāsi bhāvāntaram iti na tattvānyatva-vikalpāvakāśaḥ | tasmād utsṛjya vibhramaṃ naṣṭa-vyavahāro 'stu, na tu tasyānyat kiñcit jāyata iti | adarśanaṃ cābhāva-darśanam eveti saṃpraty eva pratyākhyātam iti sarvam anavadyam |

column2: tasmāt prasajyātmano 'bhāvasya nāśākhyasya hetur eva na kaścit | vinaśvara-svabhāve tu hetv-antara-śaktim-apākṛtya sva-hetor eva sāmarthya-samarthanād jāta-mātram eva vinaśyantīti na kṣaṇāntaram anvetīti siddheḥ | kāraṇavattvasyākṣaṇikatvena vyāpty asiddher anekāntaḥ | kṛtakānām avaśyam ante 'pi nāśābhyupagame ca virodhaḥ | pramāṇa-gocarasya pakṣīkaraṇe pratijñāyā anumāna-bādhā | agocare c`aśraya-svarūpayor asiddhir iti sthitam |

column2: [155,1] tad asya caṭula-vaṭubhāva-sulabham-anātma-jñātāviṣkaraṇa-mātram iti mantavyam | tathā hi pratyakṣa-siddhaṃ kṣaṇikatvam iti na pratyakṣa-vyavahṛtam, anurūpa-vikalpānudayāt | kiṃ tu pratyakṣa-gṛhītam, vyavahāratvānumānāt | tac cānumānaṃ yadi svayaṃ kutaścil liṅgāt prasādhya pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇabhaṅga-grahaṇa-vyavahāram ādadhīta sāmarthyāt, tadā na viśeṣaḥ sattvādy-anumānavat | arthato hi tadā pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇabhṅga-grahaṇam avasthāpyamānaṃ sva-pauruṣa-sparśābhāvāt na pratyakṣataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅga-siddhi-prasiddhiṃ puṣṇāti | yadā tu pramāṇāntara-siddham adhyakṣasya kṣaṇa-mātra-sthiti-grahaṇam āśritya vyavahāra-mātra-sādhanam anumānaṃ pṛṣṭha-ja-vikalpa-nirviśeṣaṃ tat-pauruṣam eva dīpayad utpadyate, tadā pratyakṣataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅga-siddhir iti mukhyam ākhyāyate | tad ayam arthaḥ,

column2: liṅgarūpopapattivyavakīrṇo 'yaṃ svabhāvahetuprayogaḥ | atra ca sapakṣe sad-bhāvān na virodhadoṣaḥ | dvitīya-pādena cānekāntaparihāraḥ | tathā hi, nirbhānaṃ pratyakṣe pratibhānam uktam, tato yāvatā viśeṣeṇa padārthaḥ pratyakṣe pratibhāsam āsādayati tanniyamaparihāreṇa yadi svarūpa-sthititam ābhajeta tadā sarva-saṃkīrṇam asya rūpam iti sarvatra sarvopayogādi-prasaṅgaḥ | ataḥ svarūpa-niyame pramāṇāpekṣāyāṃ pravṛtti-nivṛttikām asya yad yathā pratyakṣe pratibhātaṃ tat-tathaiva san, nānyatheti |

column2: [156,1] tad anena avaitathya-vyāpto hi pratyakṣa-pratibhāso 'rthasyānyathāvasthāne vipakṣe vyāpakābhāvād abhavaṃs tathāvasthānena vyāpyata iti darśitam | tṛtīyapādena pakṣadharmopasaṃhāraḥ tad-asiddhiparihāraś caturthena pūrvāpara-kālayor ekatve hi padārthasya dṛṣṭād rūpād rūpāntaravirahāt sakalakālakalākalitasya deśāntarayuṣo 'pi rūpasyāvaśyaṃ pratibhāsa iti na deśa-kālāntarāvasthā-pratipattaye pramāṇāntara-paryeṣaṇāvakāśaḥ | asti ca paryeṣaṇā idānīm anyadeśe kāle vā tad-vastu kathaṃ asti kiṃ-svin-nopanipātinā rāga-rasena siktam iti tad upanipāta-saṃbhaviny-avasre vimarśa-darśanāt | na ca darśana-viṣayīkṛte tathā saṃbhavaḥ | na ca dṛṣṭe 'py anavāayaḥ śakyo 'bhidhātum, tādṛśi jijñāsite raktādau rūpe kṣaṇika-tāvad-anabhyāsābhāvāt | anyathā paścād darśane 'pi nāvasāyodayaḥ syāt | tasmāt tad-anavasāyas tu tad-apratibhāsād eva |

column2: naivam, deś-kāla-kriyā-guṇādīnāṃ bhāvād bhedāsiddheḥ | bhinnasya tu saṃbandhino 'pi pratibhāsas tat-pratibhāse mā-bhūt | tasmāt kṣaṇāntara-daśāḥ sarvā nirvāsya kṣaṇa-parigatenaiva rūpeṇa pratibhāsanaṃ samasta-vastunaḥ siddham | yāvat tarhi raktādi-rūpā visadṛśī daśā na san-nidhīyate, tāvat kālam ekīkṛtau ca grahaṇam astu | tad api nāsti, daśanalakṣaṇānantaraṃ jhaṭiti vicalane vilocanasya sadṛśeṣv api tattvataḥ kṣaṇāntareṣu viparyaya-śaṅkāvatārāt, sākṣāt-kṛteṣu ca tad ayogāt | yad anantaraṃ tarhi locana-calanaṃ tad-darśanaṃ naika-kṣaṇikam avasāya-viparyaya-śaṅke pṛthag-janasya saṃbandham utthāpayitum, avaśyaṃ hi dvi-trān api kṣaṇān udīyamānam eva dad-darśanaṃ tad upayogi | tato dvi-tri-kṣaṇa-sthāyino rūpasya kathaṃ prathama-kṣaṇe pratibhāsa-bhraṃśaḥ, yena dvitīyādi-kṣaṇasya bheda-siddhir iti cet?

column2: ucyate, yadi tāvad īkṣaṇa-kṣaṇa-mātrānantaram avasāyodaye sādhakānveṣaṇam, tadā dvi-vidhaḥ pratyakṣa-pṛṣṭha-jo vikalpaḥ, dṛṣṭa-mātra-vikalpaś ca | dṛṣṭam idaṃ vastraṃ vety eva svarūpa-viśeṣa-vikalpaś ca kṛtrimetara-maṇim uktādau | tatrāsya viṣaye sādṛśyāpahārya-manda-dhiyaḥ pṛthag-janasya bhrāntir utsarga-siddhābhyāsa-prakarṣa-saṃbhavināpohyate | ataḥ prakarṣa-tāratamyenodayasya kālasya lāghava-tāratamya-niṣṭhāyāṃ darśana-kṣaṇānantaram apy ayam udayam āsādayann-aśakyasaṃbhāvana-niṣedhaḥ | dṛṣṭa-mātrasya vikapasya tu darśanānantaram eva janmotsava-siddhaṃ sāmagrī-bhedenāpohyate | tathā hi, prakṛtyā anādi-saṃsāra-santati-sātmībhūta-vikalpās tv anubhūta-pratyakṣe 'pi ca vastuni vikalpāpekṣa-pravṛtti-nivṛttayo viśeṣataḥ sukha-duḥkhaprāptiparihārārthinaḥ sarve sarvadā tat-sādhana-vimarśābhyāsa-vāsita-santatayaḥ kathaṃ tad-viṣayānubhave 'i samartha-hetau samupasthite vilambita-vikalpa-bhāvān anubhavitum arhanti? kevalaṃ kadācit saṃhatāḥ, yato na vikalpa-saṃhārābhyāsaḥ, kadācid anyāsaktiḥ, kadācid ātyantaka-mohād āmukhībhāva ity evaṃ prakāra-sāmagryā vilamba-saṃvāhita-vikalpa-janmāno bhavetuḥ | tad abhāve tu siddha eva pratyakṣ-kṣaṇānantaram udayo vikalpasya | tatas tad-darśana-vinākṛteṣu sarveṣv eva viṣaya-kṣaṇeṣu raktatādi-sandeha-dolāndolanaṃ manaso viprakṛṣṭa-kṣaṇa-pamparāsv iva dvitīya-kṣaṇe 'pi vimarśa-viṣayīkṛte katham anavakāśa? na ca pratyakṣa-pratibhāse 'py evam tasmāt kṣaṇa-parigateneva padārtha-rāśir adhyakṣa-pratibhāsam āviśati |

column2: ucyate, kiṃ tāvat svarūpa-niṣpattāv upayogād aneka-kṣaṇasya vyāpakam adhyakṣam, atha kṣaṇa-niṣpannasyaiva sthairyāt? tatrādya-kalpas tāvad asaṃbhavī, jñānasyāvayavirūpatāviyogena khaṇṭaśa utpatter ayogāt | kṣaṇa-bhedinaś ca te 'vayavā(ṛ) pratyakṣasya yadi paricchitti-svabhāvāḥ, tadā tāvanty eva pratyakṣāṇīti prathama-pratyakṣāpekṣayā saiva cintā | aparicchitti-svabhāve tu samuditam api na pratyakṣam | akhaṇṭaśaḥ paricchittiḥ samudāyena samudāyena sakalātmavastuparicchedaḥ | tadāpy ādyakṣaṇaparicchinnaḥ khaṇḍa eva sakalātmavastu, tadapraviṣṭasya tato bhinnatvāt | anyathā krameṇa pratīyamānaṃ viśvam ekam eva vastu syāt, sakalaṃ ca pratyakṣam ekam eva pratyakṣam iti |

column2: [158,1] dvitīye pakṣe 'pi niṣpanna-vyāpārasya vā? (62a) kṣaṇāntara-vyāpti-niṣpanna-vyāpārasyaiva vā? prathama-pakṣe viṣaya-grahaṇam evāsya vyāpāra iti tāvataiva vikalpa-janmāvakāśaḥ, svayaṃ kṣaṇāntaram astu mā vā? tathā ca sati calati cakṣuṣi viṣaye vā tad-viṣaya-grahaṇa-pravaṇam adhyakṣam avatiṣṭhata iti apūrvo 'yaṃ nayaḥ | agrahaṇāvakṣaṇāvasthāne tu na tāvataiva vikalpa-janmāvakāśānmuktiḥ | na ca pūrva-grāhiṇaḥ paścād agrahaṇe sthairya-pakṣa-sthitiri[ti] indriya-viṣaya-vidhāne vāgṛhṇato 'pi tasya sthitir iti śraddhāvadheyam eva | evam aniṣpanna-vyāpāra-sthitir ity api duṛśraddhānam | na hi kāryāntaravaj janmātirekeṇa jñānasyāpi vyāpāraḥ | astu caivam, tathāpīndriya-viṣayopanidhau labdhodayam adhyakṣam anadhigata-gocaram ubhaya-vicāla-kāle kalayat kilāstīti subhāṣitaṃ pūrvavat |
